QuestData.Title: Speak to Salfa
QuestData.Description: The threat of corruption comes not only from the Deadwood furbolgs to the south, but also from the east and the Winterfall furbolgs of Winterspring. If you wish to further aid us, speak with Salfa on the other side of the Hold, by the Winterspring entrance. Follow the path to the left to reach it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel through Timbermaw Hold and exit into Winterspring. Speak with Salfa, who stands guard outside the entrance to Timbermaw Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Greetings, $c - I stand guard here as both a speaker for the Timbermaw here in Winterspring and as a defender of the tribe.$B$BOur Winterfall brethren here in this frigid land have fallen under the same corruptive sway as the furbolg of Felwood. If you've come here offering the Timbermaw furbolgs aid, then we are ready to accept such an offer.
